channel.title: Vertex buffer issue
channel.description: I am having a hassle with the vertex buffer just after getting up past the overloading reactor. It happens just when I am beginning to climb up the ladder afterwards. How do i increase the vertex buffer size?

item.title: Vertex buffer issue
item.dc:creator: BlazeStryker
item.description:
I am having a hassle with the vertex buffer just after getting up past the overloading reactor. It happens just when I am beginning to climb up the ladder afterwards. How do i increase the vertex buffer size?
